channel.title: CVE Feed for qemu -- qemu (virtio-rng)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for qemu -- qemu (virtio-rng)

item.title: CVE-2013-2016|2024-08-06T15:20:37.490Z -- qemu -- qemu%20%28virtio-rng%29
item.description: A flaw was found in the way qemu v1.3.0 and later (virtio-rng) validates addresses when guest accesses the config space of a virtio device. If the virtio device has zero/small sized config space, such as virtio-rng, a privileged guest user could use this flaw to access the matching host's qemu address space and thus increase their privileges on the host.
